name: core.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: DAppNode package responsible for managing the core packages
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

warnings.onMinorUpdate: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: After updating, you must delete the volumes associated with your IPFS package here http://my.dappnode/packages/system/ipfs.dnp.dappnode.eth/info. The package has been upgraded from an older version that includes configuration changes. Removing the old volumes ensures the new configuration is applied correctly. New volumes will be created automatically.
